analysis.Summary: This is a Vue single-file component that renders a Twitter logo as an inline SVG.
analysis.Purpose: Provides a reusable Twitter social icon for use throughout the application’s UI.

Components.name: twitter.vue
Components.responsibility: Renders a 40×33 SVG path representing the Twitter logo, styled with a CSS variable for fill color.

analysis.Usage: Import the component where needed, e.g. `import TwitterIcon from 'modules/icons/socials/twitter.vue'`, then use `<TwitterIcon/>` in the template.
Notes: No `<script>` or `<style>` sections are present—this component is purely presentational.
The SVG fill color is set via the CSS variable `--white` (i.e. `fill="rgb(var(--white))"`).
Because it’s a lightweight icon, it has minimal impact on bundle size and no runtime logic.
